root.name: Commander Blood
root.description: You are an immortal cyborg, constructed by the Kanary Research Corporation, infused with the mind of it's late president, Bob Morlock, to carry out his last wish - to explore the universe in both time and space, from it's birth to the end and to answer the great questions of life. To your aid you have the Ark, a massive self-aware organic space ship, equipped with space faring dolphin probes. You have to visit planets, communicate and establish relationships with alien species, presented in glorious pre-rendered 3D landscapes and populated with puppets.
